SELECT bc.id , bc.comment , bc.likeQty , bc.boardId , bc.createDt , bc.createId , ct.nickname AS createName , bc.updateDt , bc.updateId , ut.nickname AS updateName , bc.deleteDt , bc.deleteId , dt.nickname AS deleteName , bc.deleteFlag , cl.commentId FROM board_comment_tbl AS bc LEFT JOIN comment_like_tbl AS cl ON cl.commentTbl = #{commentTbl} AND cl.createId = #{createId} AND bc.id = cl.commentId LEFT OUTER JOIN member_tbl AS ct ON bc.createId = ct.id LEFT OUTER JOIN member_tbl AS ut ON bc.updateId = ut.id LEFT OUTER JOIN member_tbl AS dt ON bc.deleteId = dt.id WHERE bc.boardId = #{boardId} AND bc.deleteFlag = false ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
